summary: This is an email chain from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical coordination for FBI agents to assist with victim support and press management at a hearing in the Epstein case scheduled for the following day (August 27, 2019) at 10:30 AM at the SDNY.

persons.name: Nor
persons.context: Appears to be an FBI agent coordinating assistance for the Epstein hearing, as the email asks recipients to let 'Nor' know if they are able to help.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing at SDNY
events.description: A hearing regarding the Epstein case is scheduled for 10:30 AM. SDNY requested FBI assistance to help with victims (anticipated 20-30), provide support, and manage press.

locations: 290 (likely an address or meeting point, context suggests 'hang tight at 290')
keyFacts: An Epstein case hearing was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM at the SDNY.
SDNY requested FBI assistance to help with an anticipated 20-30 victims, provide support, and manage press around the hearing.
FBI agents were asked to be on standby around 9:30/10:00 AM, meet at SDNY, and wear suits.
The email chain shows logistical coordination among FBI personnel for victim support during a high-profile legal proceeding.
The document references a prior 'early morn search' activity, suggesting other law enforcement actions were occurring concurrently.
